source:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_00<tab>The Great Serpent of Ronka wishes to impart divine wisdom unto you...or so you think.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
キタリの水蛇様？は、冒険者に新たな天啓を授けたい……のかもしれない。

source:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_01<tab>You engage in a stimulating conversation with the Great Serpent of Ronka, who─you surmise from the urgency and eagerness of its screeing─is keen to see the Stewards press deeper into the tunnels of Hopl's Stopple. Should you be inclined to heed its call, seek out Chaqurl Qhotl and see how you might best proceed.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには
「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラスでのみ進行できます。

キタリの水蛇様？に、発掘調査の進捗について促された気がする。「チャクルリ・コテル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_02<tab>You seek out and speak with Chaqurl Qhotl. It appears that further progress through the tunnels of Hopl's Stopple will require you to perform a ceremony in obeisance to Ox'Dalan, god of death and protector of the underworld. Qitarl Natl suggests that perhaps the Viis, as a fellow ancient race with ties to Ronka, might be able to offer apt advice in the matter. Finding his reasoning sound, you agree to accompany Chaqurl Qhotl to Fanow in search of wisdom.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_02<tab>チャクルリ・コテルと話した。洞窟遺跡の次の層へと進むため、ロンカの地下世界の神、オキス・ダランに儀式を捧げる必要があるという。ファノヴの里の「ラニル」を訪ね、話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_03<tab>Your old friends Ciuna and Phyna bid you welcome in your return to Fanow. After reminiscing about her friendship with one of Chaqurl's ancestors, Master Lanille enlightens you with the knowledge that a traditional Viis ritual may serve to appease Ox'Dalan and offer the Qitari excavation team passage to the tunnels below. At the Viis' request, you set out to procure an item suitable for use as an offering to the gods of old.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_03<tab>ラニルと話した。ダラン神への儀式の供物を探すこととなった。供物となるものを入手し、「キタルリ・ナトル」に納品しよう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_04<tab>Back at Hopl's Stopple, all rejoice at your success in tracking down the offering for the ritual, which─with the help of Chaqurl Qhotl, who has diligently learned the accompanying prayer from Master Lanille─proceeds without a hitch. At long last, the second phase of the excavation may begin. After a short while spent waiting, the Qitari father and son return...what, pray tell, did they find on their expedition?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_04<tab>供物となるものをキタルリ・ナトルに納品し、洞窟内でダラン神への儀式が行われた。ぶじ第二次調査が開始されたが、石碑は見つかったのだろうか？「チャクルリ・コテル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_05<tab>Qitarl and Chaqurl reveal that they have managed to locate the second Qitari stela which, unfortunately, is in the same shabby shape as the first one they discovered. This one appears to depict the first encounter between the Qitari and the Viis, but─not unlike last time─the father and son have different ideas about how the weathered markings should be interpreted. At the urging of yet another incarnation of the Great Serpent of Ronka─or so it appears to be─you are charged with mediating between the two and choosing the version of history that will be engraved upon the stone and passed down to posterity.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SEQ_05<tab>発掘隊の拠点に儀式の祭壇が設けられ、洞窟遺跡の内部では、壊れた「第二の石碑」が見つかった。水蛇様の導きにより、キタリ族たちは今回も、石碑を新たに復元するつもりのようだ。石碑に彫り残す歴史について、冒険者は、またもロンカの同盟者として選択を託されたが……！？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Chaqurl Qhotl.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TODO_00<tab>チャクルリ・コテルと話す

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lanille in Fanow.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TODO_01<tab>ファノヴの里のラニルと話す

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_001<tab>Scree!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_001<tab>キィ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>The serpent jumps about joyfully. It appears that the Qitari excavation effort is proceeding swimmingly. Speak with Chaqurl Qhotl and see if there is anything you might do to lend a hand.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>「キタリの水蛇様？」は、満足げな鳴き声をあげている。
洞窟遺跡の発掘は、順調に進んでいるようだ。
「チャクルリ・コテル」と話し、発掘の進捗について聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_011<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You'll be happy to know that the charm your friends fashioned for us worked most splendidly! We've been able to reach deeper depths than ever before!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どの！
魔除けの護符の効果はバツグンで、発掘は順調でござうよ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_011<tab>And thanks to you, the restoration of the first stela is all but complete! You simply must see it!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_011<tab>その後のご支援のおかげもあって、
第一次調査で発見された洞窟遺跡の「第一層」の発掘は、
だいたい終わったみたいでござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_012<tab>...Ahem. You'll also be pleased to know that the relics and records that turned up in our subsequent trips below have confirmed that the interpretation of history that you espoused was indeed and indubitably true.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_012<tab>うむ、それに第一層の出土品への詳しい調査も行った結果、
復元した石碑に彫り残した仮説は、
やはり間違いのない解釈であったようでござる。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_013<tab>We came upon many ritual instruments in the tunnels below. It would seem that─in the empire's earliest days─the Ronkans would offer individuals chosen from the races they conquered as living sacrifices to their gods. The markings on the first stela depict just such a scene.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_013<tab>建国当初のロンカ帝国では、新たに屈服させた種族の命を、
まず神々への供物として、儀式で捧げておった。
皇帝が剣を振り上げる構図も、その場面であるとも捉えられよう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_014<tab>But this was not simply a cruel and callous tradition. Once these conquered peoples were recognized by the Ronkan gods, they were welcomed into Ronkan society, and given the chance to serve the empire and live peaceful, prosperous lives under its auspices.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_014<tab>そうして一度供物に捧げられた種族は、
神々に認められ、ロンカの民として帝国に迎えられる。
そうしてキタリ族も、皇帝に仕えることとなったのでござるな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_015<tab>It is a somewhat chilling tale, but we must be grateful to our ancestors, who gave their own lives that we who followed might live a brighter future.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_015<tab>信を契る儀式とは言えど……
身を捧げてくれたご先祖様に、感謝せねばなるまい。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_016<tab>To think that I am only alive today because my forefathers spilled their blood... It is a bit much to take in all at once, but I'm sure I will come to understand.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_016<tab>ご先祖様たちのおかげで、
今のチャクルリたちがいるのでござうな……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_017<tab>We came upon many ritual instruments in the tunnels below. It is most clear that─let it suffice to say─we Qitari have never been particularly adept at the art of war. So it was that our ancestors searched far and wide for a safe haven where they could call home.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_017<tab>キタリ族は今も昔も、戦いを得意とする種族ではござらん。
安住の地を得るため、ご先祖様も苦労を重ねたことであろう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_018<tab>Ronka, on the other hand, was composed of many strong peoples─the Ronso, brave warriors; the Drahn, adept at the arcane arts; and the Viis, peerless archers─all working together for the empire's prosperity.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_018<tab>一方、ロンカ帝国は、皇族であったとされるロンゾ族、
神官のドラン族、近衛隊のヴィース族など……
様々な種族が集まった、多民族国家であったと考えられる。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_019<tab>Not long after the Qitari first made contact with the empire, our skill as scribes and scriveners became evident to high-ranking court officials, and we were offered a prominent role in Ronkan society in return for our loyal service.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_019<tab>我らキタリも書記官として仕えることで、その庇護下に入り、
安定した生活を得ることができたのでござろう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_020<tab>Four races so different, all living and working together for the greater good! Oh, what I wouldn't give to be able to live just one day in those glorious days of the empire!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_020<tab>色んな種族をまとめて、
みんなで仲良くして国を豊かにする……。
やっぱり、ロンカ皇帝は偉大なお方であったでござうな！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_021<tab>...But our work is far from done. Indeed, in our explorations, we have found what appears to be an entrance leading to an even deeper level of the caves. I have little doubt that the remaining stelae lie further below.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_021<tab>そして、第一層の深部まで進んだところ……
次なる石碑が眠っていると目される、
「第二層」への入口が見つかり申した。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_022<tab>I have sent a team below to conduct a preliminary investigation before we begin the next phase of the excavation in earnest. My trusted scout Towarl Manol should be here to make her report at any─
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_022<tab>今回も、先の安全を確かめるべく、予備調査を行っておる。
そろそろ、トワルリが報告をよこすはずにござるが……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_023<tab>Master Qitarl! I bring news from below! News that I fear...is not good.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_023<tab>キタルリ隊長ぉ……「第二次調査」の開始、
ただちに始めるのは、難しそうにござりまする……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_024<tab>Again!? I swear─if we Qitari did not have rotten luck we would have none at all. Do tell...what did you find down there?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_024<tab>む、むむ！？
またにござるか……いったい今回は、何事でござろう？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_025<tab>Entering the second stratum, we came upon a shrine to our protector, Ox'Dalan. It appeared to have been ravaged by the beasts that lurk below, but still it stood after all these years...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_025<tab>はぁ……第二層に立ち入ってすぐ見つかったのは、
我らの庇護神、オキス・ダランに捧ぐ祭壇にござりました。
もっとも、魔物が暴れたのか、荒れ果てておりましたが……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_026<tab>A shrine, you say? No doubt it was erected by our ancestors, most likely to ward off some greater danger that lurks further below...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_026<tab>ふむ、祭壇跡があるとすれば、
神の鎮めの力を頼るほどに警戒した何かが、第二層にはあったとな？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_027<tab>This was my thought as well, Master Qitarl. A cave-in? A flood? Fearsome creatures from the deep? We were too fear stricken to press onward, not knowing what manner of calamity might befall us...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_TWARLMANOL_000_027<tab>さようにございます、祭壇を無視して進めば、
落盤に鉄砲水、どんな事故があっても、おかしゅうないかと！
こんなことでは、怖くて進めぬでござりますぅ……！！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_028<tab>But we must press on somehow! Can we not appeal to Dalan somehow, that He might protect us as we delve further?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_028<tab>うーん、次の石碑を見つけて、さらにその先に進むには、
神様への儀式、行わなくちゃでござうか？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_029<tab>Indeed...perhaps there is a suitable ritual for the occasion. Sadly, if there is, I fear it is beyond my knowledge...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_029<tab>ああ……しかし、祭壇でどのような儀式を行えばよいか、
ご先祖様の知識なき我らでは、なんとも……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_A1_000_001<tab>I think I know a Viis who could help you...
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_A1_000_001<tab>儀式に詳しいラニルというヴィースがいる

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_A1_000_002<tab>Perhaps you might find an answer in Fanow?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_A1_000_002<tab>ファノヴの里のヴィースなら知っているのでは？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_030<tab>Why, yes! Indeed, the Viis are nothing if not well versed in Ronkan tradition!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_030<tab>なるほどー！
ヴィースのお姉さんたちなら、
ロンカの儀式のこと、いっぱい知ってるでござうな！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_032<tab>The one with hair the color of night─Master Lanille, was it? I hear she has lived as long as ten Qitari! Yes, I am certain she will have knowledge that will serve us well!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_032<tab>夜色の髪を持つ、ラニルどの……
指南役のその方なら、頼りになるはずっ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_031<tab>Long-lived as they are, the wisdom they have passed down through generations doubtless rivals that which our ancestors recorded. If anyone can help us, I daresay it is them.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_031<tab>うむ、一代で長くを生きる彼女らの知恵は、
我らの石碑の如く、盤石にござろうな。
ダラン神への祭儀についても、通じておられるやも知れぬ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_033<tab>Good <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Pray take me to Fanow at once. I would meet their Master Lanille, that I might partake in her deep knowledge of ancient Ronkan rites.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_033<tab>それなら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どの！
「ファノヴの里」にいる、儀式にお詳しいラニルどのを、
そるかしに、ご紹介いただきとうござうよー！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_040<tab>So many Viis in one place! I can scarce believe my eyes!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_040<tab>ヴィースのお姉さんたちが、いっぱいでござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_041<tab>Scree! Scree!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_041<tab>キュィっキィ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You grace us again with your presence. Me? I will be departing on my journey any day now. Yes, as soon as I decide where my destination will be...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_042<tab>まだ旅に出てなかったのかって？
んもう、同盟者さんまで！
シュナやみんなに、毎日のように、つつかれてるのよ？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_043<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. For better or for worse, little has changed with me since last we met. Phyna, too, is as indecisive as ever...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_043<tab>同盟者さん、久しぶりね。
ファイナもなかなか旅に出ないし、私たちは相変わらずよ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_045<tab>We had heard rumors the Qitari had returned to the Greatwood, but did not expect to receive a visit so soon. Just seeing you brings back memories of olden times...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_045<tab>キタリ族の者が里の外に現れたこと、報告を受けていたが……。
こうして訪ねてきてくれるとは、懐かしい限りだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_046<tab>Memories? Do you mean that...you knew my ancestors?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_046<tab>なつかし……？？
キタリ族に、会ったことがあるでござうか！？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_047<tab>...I am older than you might think, my little friend. Anyhow, the answer is yes. Have you heard the name Shiparl Toqal? She was a close friend of mine, and would come calling often to exchange news of the wood.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_047<tab>ああ、私は里の古株だからな……
よく里を訪ねてきてくれた彼らと、ともに語らったものだ。
きみ、我が友シパルリ・トカリの名を聞いたことは？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_048<tab>Shiparl Toqal? I do believe I saw that name on Father's family tree. But if I recall correctly, she was my...great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-grandmother!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_048<tab>シパルリ……ええと確か、
父上が書き付けている家系図で、見た覚えがあるでござうよ。
そるかしの、ひい、ひいひい……8代前のおばあちゃんにござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_049<tab>Ahahaha! It was that long ago, was it? How quickly the years fly by. Still, I am heartened by your presence, young Chaqurl. For many years after the Flood, I feared we would never see one of your kind again.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_049<tab>はははっ、そんなにもなるか！
「光の氾濫」後は、もう二度と会えぬものかと思っていたが……
改めて、ファノヴの里へと歓迎しよう、チャクルリ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_049<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Welcome back to Fanow. What brings you to us this day?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_049<tab>して、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿と共に訪ねてくるとは、
何か困りごとか？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_050<tab>...I see. Our Qitari friends seek to discover their history, and reclaim the knowledge and lore of their ancestors. An admirable goal, indeed. And doubtless not a simple task.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_050<tab>なるほど……。
石碑と共に失った先祖の記憶と、ロンカの叡智を取り戻すこと……
それが今のキタリ族の「使命」なのだな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_051<tab>We would be honored to lend you our aid, and reforge the bonds between our peoples that were so strong in the days of Ronka. Now, do tell me more about these tunnels you are exploring!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_051<tab>困っているなら、古きロンカの友として、もちろん力を貸すわ。
それに、キタリ族にしか辿り着けない洞窟遺跡だなんて！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_052<tab>My dear sister has quite a weakness for ancient Ronkan ruins and relics, you see.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_052<tab>あははっ！
シュナったら、ロンカ遺跡の話になると耳がピンとするんだから！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_053<tab>To tell the truth, I had been preparing to leave the Greatwood on a journey of the realm. But if the Qitari require my aid, perhaps I could postpone my departure just a bit longer...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_053<tab>私は、森を旅立つつもりで準備を進めていたところなの。
でもファノヴの里のそばに、森の仲間が増えたなら……
もう少しだけ、出発は先にのばそうかな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_054<tab>Scree!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_054<tab>キィっキィ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_055<tab>It would seem that the great serpent smiles upon our partnership as well. This is auspicious, indeed.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_055<tab>水蛇様の化身か……この存在も、キタリ族たちを助けているのだな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_056<tab>Master Lanille, what knowledge of the Qitari lives on here in Fanow?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_056<tab>それで……ラニル、キタリ族たちの伝承って、
どれほどファノヴに残っているの？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_057<tab>Very little, I am afraid─the tales I can remember hearing from my dear departed friend, and no more. Sadly, the precise details of Qitari rites and rituals are beyond my recollection.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_057<tab>それについては、私が友について覚えている限り、だな。
残念ながら、キタリ族の石碑や儀式については、
詳しく伝えるものは無いはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_058<tab>And yet, I do recall Shiparl once mentioning that Qitari prayers to Ox'Dalan were remarkably similar in form to our own petitions to Yx'Maja.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_058<tab>しかし、キタリ族のシパルリと、随分昔に話したことがある……
我らが奉じるイキス・マヤエへの祈りと、
彼らのオキス・ダランへの祈りは、実に似通っているとな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_059<tab>It is not so surprising, perhaps, given how closely our two peoples were connected in those days. If we were to teach you one of our own traditions, mayhap you could adapt it for your own purposes?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_059<tab>さすが同じロンカの民だと、絆を濃く感じたものだよ。
つまり、こたびキタリ族が必要だという儀式は、
我らの儀式を参考に、ダラン神へのものへと応用すれば良いだろう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_060<tab>You would do this for us!?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_060<tab>それじゃあ……！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_061<tab>Gladly, old friend. But first, we will need to prepare a simple altar for performing the rite, and find ourselves a suitable offering.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_061<tab>ああ、つまりは祭壇を用意し、同じ作法で儀式を行うまでだ。
そのためには、地底神の好む供物を集めねば、だな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_062<tab>The liver and blood of an ancient beast, together with pristine water from a sacred spring near the K'mul Astropolis. Yes, I do believe this will suffice.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_062<tab>必要なものは、古獣の血と肝、それに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2734A01 /var>」……
そちらはクムル星遺跡群付近で採れるはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_062<tab>The liver and blood of an ancient beast, together with the root of a spiritweed, a rare shrub that grows near the K'mul Astropolis. Yes, I do believe this will suffice.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_062<tab>必要なものは、古獣の血と肝、それに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2736401 /var>」……
そちらはクムル星遺跡群付近で採れるはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_200_062<tab>The liver and blood of an ancient beast, together with a single Dalan's claw─a rare crustacean that lurks in the chill waters of the Lozatl.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_200_062<tab>必要なものは、古獣の血と肝、それに「<var 28 ((Item)) F2737E01 /var>」……
そちらはロツァトル川で採れるはずだ。
釣り餌ならば「<var 28 ((Item)) F26BBE01 /var>」が適当だろう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_063<tab>I know the ways of the beasts of the wood─leave the hunting to me. As for the final offering, I suspect <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> would have little difficulty acquiring it, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_063<tab>獣の狩りは、私たちに任せてちょうだい。
あとは同盟者さん、お願いできるかしら？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_064<tab>Excellent. In the meanwhile, I will teach the ritual to young Chaqurl here. Were the passage into the tunnels larger, we would accompany you ourselves, but alas...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_000_064<tab>私はチャクルリ殿に、儀式の作法を教えておこう。
ファイナたちが洞窟遺跡の中まで指導に行ければ良いが、
そうもいかないからな。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_065<tab>Do not worry, my good Master Lanille! I will learn the words and gestures well, and Dalan will hear our plea! Just you wait and see!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_065<tab>そるかし、がんばるでござうよ！
神様にもご先祖様にも、お祈りが届くように！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_066<tab>You're a spirited one, child. But be forewarned: Master Lanille is a strict taskmistress.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_066<tab>うふふっ、ラニルの指導は厳しいわよ？
頑張ってね！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_067<tab>Egads! F-Forgive me, my friends. I will do my best. Anyhow, let us all reconvene at Hopl's Stopple when we are finished with our allotted tasks.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_067<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どの、供物が採れたら、
「ホパル古盤」の父上に渡してほしいでござうよ。
そるかしは、お勉強が終わったら、お姉さんたちと向かうでござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_070<tab>Master Lanille won't be too hard on me, will she?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_100_070<tab>儀式のお勉強、がんばるでござうよ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どのは、供物が採れたら、
ホパル古盤の父上に渡してほしいでござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_071<tab>I thank you, friend. It is not every day that we can reunite with friends from an age long past.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_LANILLE_100_071<tab>おかげで、友の懐かしい顔を思い出せたよ。
礼を言うぞ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_100_072<tab>Scree...eee?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_100_072<tab>キュィ～……キィっ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>The great serpent lets out a high-pitched squeal. It appears to be quite pleased to see the Qitari and the Viis working together toward a common good.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>「キタリの水蛇様？」は、感極まった細い鳴き声をあげている。
ヴィースとキタリの絆に、心動かされたようだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_080<tab>I was wondering when you might return, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Have you found the offering that we require?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_080<tab>帰りを心待ちにしておったぞ！
ダラン神への儀式の目処は、いかがにござろう？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_082<tab>The Viis believe that one of their rituals will suffice to appease Dalan? I am skeptical, but I suppose we have little choice but to try. Should you find a suitable offering, pray bring it to us.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_082<tab>地底神への儀式には、相応の供物が必要となろう。
採集をお頼み申せるのは、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿だけにござる！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_081<tab>The Viis believe this will suffice as an offering to Dalan? ...Very well, so be it. As soon as Chaqurl and the Viis arrive, we shall begin the second phase of the excavation.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_081<tab>おお、これが儀式の供物に……。
チャクルリと、手伝いを申し出てくれたヴィースたちが集まれば、
すぐにも「第二次調査」を始めようぞ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_085<tab>Why, just look at all the Qitari scurrying about! I had heard they were an industrious people, but to see it with my own eyes is impressive indeed!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_085<tab>ここがキタリ族の……！
遺跡の発掘のために集まっているなんて、素晴らしいわ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_086<tab>Hail, and well met. I am Phyna of Fanow, and this is my sister Ciuna. We have come to assist in the ritual of which your son has doubtless told you.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_086<tab>初めまして！　私たち、ファノヴから来た者よ。
ダラン神への儀式のことを聞いて、手伝わせてもらってるの。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_087<tab>Greetings, greetings. Please accept my apologies for making a fuss so close to your village, and without properly paying my respects. I fear I've been quite preoccupied with my duties here...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_087<tab>これはこれは、倅が世話になっておりますれば。
我らキタリこそ、貴方がたの里の近くを騒がしくしてござろう。
挨拶に伺わねばと、考えておったのでござるが……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_088<tab>There is no need for that, friend. It is we who should apologize for our sisters who gave you such a fright upon your return home...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_088<tab>私たちこそ、最初にあなたたちを見つけたとき、
怖い思いをさせてしまったって聞いたわ……
本当に、申し訳ないことをしたわね。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_089<tab>As you may well know, our peoples were strong friends and allies in the days of Ronka. It is our honor to reforge those bonds in the present day. Should you require anything of us, you need but say the word.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_089<tab>私たちは近くに暮らす、ロンカの同胞同士よ。
これからは、いつでも協力させてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_090<tab>Anyhow, thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here, it would seem we have all the offerings needed to proceed with the ritual. Do you remember all that Master Lanille taught you, Chaqurl?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_090<tab>同盟者さんが採ってきてくれたものと、私たちの獲物を合わせて、
供物の準備は問題なさそうね。
儀式の進め方も、大丈夫そうかしら？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_091<tab>But of course! I said the words over to myself a hundred hundred times on the way here! I will do your Master Lanille and my people proud!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_091<tab>もっちろん！
洞窟のなかで、そるかしたちだけで儀式ができるよう、
ラニルどののところで、ちゃーんとお勉強してきたでござうよ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_092<tab>I should hope so, my son. Very well! Let the dig begin!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_092<tab>うむ、結構！
それでは……「第二次調査」の、開始でござる！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Some time later...
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>しばらくして……

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Qitarl Natl and Chaqurl Qhotl have safely returned from their investigation of the tunnels.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>チャクルリ・コテルとキタルリ・ナトルによる、
「第二次調査」が完了した！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_HELMETTSUCHINOKO_000_102<tab>Scree?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_HELMETTSUCHINOKO_000_102<tab>キィ？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_103<tab>Another avatar of the great serpent? What is the meaning of this?
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_103<tab>水蛇様……洞窟遺跡から、一緒に出てきたの！？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_104<tab>It would seem that things beyond our understanding are afoot in the depths below...
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_104<tab>いったい、洞窟遺跡の内部で何が起こっていたのかしら……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_115<tab>I...I cannot say for sure. We found a second stela, but I fear─much as the last one─it proved too massive to carry to the surface.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_115<tab>うーむむ……やっぱり、今回もでござう。
「第ニの石碑」を発見するも、地上には持ち帰れず……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_116<tab>Just as we were pondering our next course of action, this armor-clad fellow arrived, and let out a mighty─
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_116<tab>そしてまた、地下で我らの前に現れたのが、
鉄冑を被られた水蛇様よ……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_HELMETTSUCHINOKO_000_117<tab>Screeeeeeeee!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_HELMETTSUCHINOKO_000_117<tab>キキィ～っ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_118<tab>...Er, precisely. While I cannot confess to fully understand the import of what it is saying, I can only surmise that the serpent once again wishes for us to call upon the wisdom of the ally of Ronka─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that is─and restore the stela to its erstwhile form.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_118<tab>第一の石碑が見つかったとき、水蛇様は、
我らが<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿の知恵を借り、
石碑を復元するのを良しとされた。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_119<tab>And yet, much as last time, the engravings are weathered to no small degree. I have my own thoughts about what they signify, but I would hear my son's theory first. What say you, Chaqurl?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_119<tab>つまり今回も、同じ道をお示しになっておられよう……。
チャクルリ、こたび発見した石碑を、そなたはどう見た？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_120<tab>Well, let me see now... One marking was clearly of a Viis, nocking a bow. Then I could make out the semblance of a Qitari, its arms seemingly held in the air...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_120<tab>えっと……石碑に彫られていたのは、
「弓を構えたヴィースの狩人」と、
「両手をあげたキタリたち」の似姿でござったよ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_121<tab>The image of a Viis on a Qitari stone? How fascinating...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_121<tab>石碑にヴィースの姿が？
それは興味深いわ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_122<tab>Just as the first stela depicted our history with the Ronkan Empire, no doubt these markings tell of the first encounter between our two peoples...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_122<tab>第一の石碑……皇帝との像とおんなじで、
ヴィースとキタリが、最初に出会った場面に違いなく……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_123<tab>Having befriended the benevolent Ronkans, our people then met the Viis, skilled hunters and wise to the ways of the forest! So pleased were our ancestors, that they threw their hands into the air in glee!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_123<tab>皇帝と友情を結んだキタリ族は、
強くてカッコいいヴィース族と出会って大歓迎したでござうよ！
ロンカに迎えるトモダチが増えて、両手をあげて喜んだでござう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_124<tab>That is a most...<var 1A 02 /var>optimistic<var 1A 01 /var> interpretation, my boy.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_124<tab>石碑は今回も、出会いの記憶を描いているか……。
その点は、父も同意しようぞ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_125<tab>And yet I feel it is more logical to read the stone a different way. Doubtless the Viis came upon our ancestors, small and scurrying about the forest, and took them for prey.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_125<tab>しかし、その解釈は異なる。
おそらくヴィース族は、初めて見たキタリ族を獲物と思い、
弓で射ろうとしたのでござろう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_126<tab>Facing arrows pointed at their hearts, our ancestors threw up their hands in sheer terror. So it was that the Viis─newcomers to the Greatwood─nearly came into conflict with the mighty Ronkan Empire...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_126<tab>キタリ族の似姿が、両手をあげていたのは恐怖ゆえ。
森にやって来たヴィースは、あわやロンカの敵になりかけた、
そんな歴史の一幕ではなかろうか……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_127<tab>Our legends tell of how the goddess Yx'Maja guided our people to the forest, but say little of what awaited us upon our arrival there. As far as we can say, both theories are more than plausible. Still, I would hope to believe...
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_127<tab>私たちの伝承では、女神イキス・マヤエが、
流浪の民だったヴィースを導いたと言われているけれど……
それだけじゃ、ふたりの説の判断材料にはならなそうね。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_128<tab>...No. I will say no more. It would ill behoove me to stick my nose in matters of Qitari lore.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_PHYNA_000_128<tab>なにより、これはキタリ族が守ってきた伝承だもの、
私たちが口を出しちゃ、いけないはずだわ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_129<tab>I agree. Qitari history should be written by the Qitari themselves. In any event, we are pleased that we were able to contribute to your cause in some small way.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_129<tab>ええ、その通りだわ。
私たちは、このままファノヴの里に戻ることにしましょう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_130<tab>We shall return to Fanow, but please do not hesitate to call upon us again. There is still much catching up to do between our peoples.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CIUNA_000_130<tab>石碑の復元が進んだら、きっと教えてちょうだいね！
私たちも、発掘に役立つ情報が見つかったら、
すぐにあなたたちに知らせるわ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_131<tab>Once again, it seems we find ourselves with a choice to make...
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_QITARLNATL_000_131<tab>やはり我らの意見は重ならぬまま、選択だけが残され申したか……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_132<tab>Scree! Scree!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_BOUSHITSUCHINOKO_000_132<tab>キィっ！！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_133<tab>Yes, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Do impart unto us your wisdom once more! How are you inclined to interpret our history?
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_CHAQURLQHOTL_000_133<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>どの、
水蛇様のお導きでござう……
キタリ族の歴史、お示しくだされ！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>Again, father and son have arrived at different theories regarding the history of the Qitari as recorded on the stela. At the bidding of the great serpent, it falls to you to serve as mediator.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>キタリ族の親子は、新たな石碑に残す先祖の逸話について、
ふたたび互いに異なる説を唱えているようです。
水蛇様は、あなたにキタリ族の歴史を託そうとしていますが……？

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_136<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Respected<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Stewards.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_136<tab>「キタリ族：ルリの発掘隊」との友好関係が、
「敬意」になりました。
儀式の準備に力を貸したことで、信頼を勝ち得たようです。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_137<tab>With the wisdom and blessing of the Viis, an altar to Ox'Dalan has been constructed at Hopl's Stopple. Doubtless this will serve to protect and impart good fortune to the Qitari as they continue to explore the tunnels.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_137<tab>さらに、ファノヴの里のヴィース族の知恵により、
ホパル古盤の拠点には、儀式の祭壇が備えられました。
洞窟内の安全が祈願されることで、発掘はより順調に進むでしょう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_138<tab>New Qitari beast tribe daily quests are now available from Qhoterl Pasol at Hopl's Stopple.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_138<tab>これ以降、ホパル古盤にいる「コテルリ・パソリ」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_139<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Qhoterl Pasol as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_139<tab>なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「コテルリ・パソリ」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Qhoterl Pasol. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_141<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from Yuqurl Manl.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ003_03796_SYSTEM_000_141<tab>また、「ユクルリ・マノル」より、
「友好関係：敬意」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！
